# SEQ09 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 9 focuses on work

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl041, apl042, apl043, apl044, apl045, apl046, apl047, apl048, apl049, apl050

## Emergent Phenomena
Integration of work into the fabric of community life rather than segregated industrial zones

## Overview
This sequence contains 10 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
